findings.title: Reentrancy protection issue
findings.description: Inadequate reentrancy protection at the protocol-wide level
findings.location: Qubit Finance smart contract, Multiple Contracts, Business Logic

findings.title: Front-running vulnerability in repayBorrowBehalf()
findings.description: repayment amount of âˆ’1 can be taken advantage to launch a front-running borrow() operation, resulting in a higher borrowing balance for repayment.

findings.title: Inefficient logic in removeMarket()
findings.description: current logic on market removal can be improved for gas efficiency.
findings.location: removeMarket() function, removeMarket() function in QoreAdmin contract

findings.title: Redundant state/code issue
findings.description: unnecessary redundancies that can be safely removed.
findings.location: Qubit Finance smart contract, Multiple Contracts, e.g. QubitToken contract

findings.title: Missing event emission upon settings changes
findings.description: related events are not emitted when various important parameters are updated.
findings.location: Settings change handler function, setKeeper(), setQValidator(), and setQDistributor() functions in QoreAdmin contract

findings.title: Trust issue with admin keys
findings.description: Privileged owner account can modify sensitive system parameters, potentially undermining the MOAR design.
findings.location: Admin key management system, Multiple Contracts (Qubit protocol)

findings.title: Unsound assumption in PriceCalculator on asset decimals
findings.description: getUnderlyingPrice() function makes an implicit assumption about the asset decimal, which may not always hold.

findings.title: Incorrect calculation of accruedQubit()
findings.description: The accruedQubit() function does not necessarily return the full rewards credited to the user.
